name.ja: マジシャンズ・センス

requirement.en: When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster while you have 3 or more Spell Cards in your Graveyard.

effect.en: Set up to 2 "Thousand Knives", "Dark Magic Attack", and/or "Dark Resonance Burst" from your Graveyard in your Spell & Trap Zone. Then, you take no battle damage from your opponent's Level 9 or lower monsters' attacks this turn.
